review_title: Benefits of Working for IRI Turkey
job_title: Program Officer & Monitoring and Evaluation Officer in Ankara
pros: Working conditions are very good. The team is professional, and the institute manages quite good projects for the promoting democratization worldwide.
cons: It may be discouraging for people to work in an American institution affiliated with projects with political parties in Turkey, as anti-Americanism is a rising public trend in Turkey. However, reputation of IRI is high in Turkey and it is safe to work.
